examples.example: 即使只有一分钟的时间，我也要充分利用起来去做有意义的事。

translate.english: Even if there is only one minute of time, I will also make full use of it to do meaningful things.

examples.example: 我会珍惜每一分钟，去努力实现自己的梦想。

translate.english: I will cherish every minute to strive to realize my own dream.

examples.example: 哪怕只有一分钟的空闲，我也会用来给家人打个电话，送上我的关心。

translate.english: Even if there is only one minute of free time, I will also use it to make a phone call to my family and send my concern.
